full_text: Further details ➡️ https://t.co/qvY0nVhFKw  Schools have autonomy to assess & report achievement for students.   .@Education_Ire to issue guidelines to schools as to how they can do this. Schools will also be asked to set out their plans clearly for students and their families.

Today I announced changes to the #JuniorCycle   A few main things -   There are no state exams for the JC this year’s students.  And school students will not be sitting exams early in the next school year.  1/3
